SupplierProduct.name: SupplierProduct
SupplierProduct.description: Represents information that's used to track the products that are purchased from a supplier.

AttributeEndDate.description: The date when the product attribute becomes inactive.

AttributeStartDate.description: The date when the product attribute becomes active.

DefaultProductEmssnFctrId.description: The default emissions factor associated with this product that's purchased from the supplier.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the product is currently active or inactive.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

Name.description: The name of this supplier product data.

OwnerId.description: The ID of the user who owns this record.

ProductId.description: The product that the organization is purchasing from the associated supplier.

SourcingAllocPercentage.description: The sourcing allocation percentage of a supplier towards the total quantity that's purchased by an organization.

SupplierId.description: The supplier that's associated with the sale of this product.

SupplierRank.description: The rank given to the supplier that helps an organization determine when to engage a supplier to make a purchase.
